<c8y-title>
  {{ 'Home' | translate }}
</c8y-title>
<c8y-widgets-dashboard
  [contextDashboard]="{}"
  [widgets]="widgets"
  [settings]="{
    isDisabled: false,
    canDelete: false,
    translateWidgetTitle: true,
    allowFullscreen: false,
    title: false
  }"
>
</c8y-widgets-dashboard>

<c8y-title>
  {{ title }}
</c8y-title>
<c8y-widgets-dashboard
  [context]="currentContext$ | async"
  [widgets]="widgets$ | async"
  [settings]="{
    isLoading: isLoading$ | async,
    isDisabled: true,
    canDelete: false,
    translateWidgetTitle: true,
    allowFullscreen: false,
    title: false
  }"
>
</c8y-widgets-dashboard>
